reviewText: Profiles Featuring Pat Cooper was a good interview. My only nitpick was on the Amazon listing it implies Connie Francis would be featured. She wasn't. On the cover of the DVD she was even mentioned. Actually Pat Cooper must have Opened for her at one time, but on the program it wasn't referred to. Fans of Pat Cooper will like this the most.

Jordan's part is only 30 minutes long, then it shows someone else for the last 30 minutes.

Plus, now the whole thing is available on youtube. Save your money

This was not what I had thought it would be but it was an ok interview.  Mr Robinson stated that he had recorded several of his concerts when this interview was taking place.  I am hoping that he wil release these concerts in a DVD formant.
This dvd is more than I expected! It's shows a Jordan Knight like I never seen before. The interview goes from his personal to professional life. I loved it! It's a must if you admire Jordan Knight!
